mapper.select: SELECT u.USERQNA_NUM, u.USER_NO, u.USERQNA_TITLE, u.USERQNA, u.USERQNA_IMG, a.ANSWER_TITLE, a.ANSWER_QNA, a.ADMIN_NAME FROM USERQNA_INFO u LEFT JOIN ANSWER_INFO a ON u.USERQNA_NUM = a.USERQNA_NUM ORDER BY u.USERQNA_NUM DESC

SELECT u.USERQNA_NUM, u.USER_NO, u.USERQNA_TITLE, u.USERQNA, u.USERQNA_IMG, a.ANSWER_TITLE, a.ANSWER_QNA, a.ADMIN_NAME FROM USERQNA_INFO u LEFT JOIN ANSWER_INFO a ON u.USERQNA_NUM = a.USERQNA_NUM WHERE u.USERQNA_NUM = #{userQnaNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWER_INFO (USERQNA_NUM, USER_NO, ANSWER_TITLE, ANSWER_QNA, ADMIN_NAME) VALUES (#{userQnaNum}, #{userNo}, #{answerTitle}, #{answerQna}, #{adminName})
